task.summary: Added git support to Android IDE.
Added git support to Android IDE.
Added SQLite weather saving and also added unit tests for them.
Added Weather content provider. Select and Insert are working.
Added Weather content provider update and delete operations. The unit tests for the delete operation are currently failing for some reason.
Loaders are now integrated with te UI

MESSAGE.value: Added git support to Android IDE.
Added SQLite weather saving and also added unit tests for them.
Added Weather content provider. Select and Insert are working.
Added Weather content provider update and delete operations. The unit tests for the delete operation are currently failing for some reason.
Loaders are now integrated with te UI
Implemented a new forecast adapter and some date format utility methods.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Implemented a new forecast adapter and some date format utility methods.
